ModMiningHelmetsCopperMiningHelmet: A copper helmet with a candle housed inside it providing illumination.
ModMiningHelmetsLitCopperMiningHelmet: Burning softly, this copper mining helmet provides hands-free lighting.
ModMiningHelmetsTinMiningHelmet: A tin mining helmet, it offers some light but not much in protection.
ModMiningHelmetsLitTinMiningHelmet: A tin mining helmet lit to provide illumination, its light lasts long but not as long in combat.
ModMiningHelmetsWroughtIronMiningHelmet: A mining helmet made from wrought iron. Useful for using both hands in the dark
ModMiningHelmetsLitWroughtIronMiningHelm: A lit wrought iron helmet, offers some degree of protection and light.
ModMiningHelmetsIronMiningHelmet: Forged from iron, this mining helmet is ready to light the way.
ModMiningHelmetsLitIronMiningHelmet: Tough and long lasting, this bright iron mining helmet is a handy tool for spelunking.
ModMiningHelmetsBronzeMiningHelmet: A sturdy mining helmet made of bronze, ready to be lit.
ModMiningHelmetsLitBronzeMiningHelmet: This radiant bronze mining helmet lights your way, parting the darkness.
ModMiningHelmetsLavaBeetleMiningHelmet: A lava beetle helmet with a candle glued on top of the horn. Providing light while retaining the same amount of protection.
ModMiningHelmetsLitLavaBeetleMiningHelme: With a lit candle atop its horn, This lava beetle helmet illuminates and protects your head.
